Text:
looks like I guessed right.. its a DDOS
like the priv trackers had

http://torrentfreak.com/demonoid-to-suffer-prolonged-downtime-after-ddos-attack-120727/

I thought the fix is easy..any ip calling the site over and over is auto added to the block list

if you want to find heaps mroe seeders
add this tracker as well.. it may go from 4 seeders
to 20 or 50 seeders like
http://tracker.ccc.de:80/announce

people might not be aware of a new exploit in most
routers (came known only in dec 2011)
and still linksys havent patched it for many routers!

a feature called WPS that has a admin pin
which is weak.. and allows to find WPA passwords
once its found out in like 2 hours of the attack

http://superuser.com/questions/374624/how-do-i-configure-my-linksys-routers-to-resist-the-wps-brute-force-vulnerabilit
